people_also_ask.heading: The secret was the fact an undead LeChuck was hiding under the monkey head (implied). This then changed during the series to the fact the giant monkey head was part of a robot (explicit).03-Mar-2015
people_also_ask.title: What is the secret of Monkey Island? - Arqade

people_also_ask.heading: Overview. The Monkey Island series is known for its humor and "player-friendly" qualities. The player cannot permanently place the game in an unwinnable state or cause Guybrush to die without great effort.
people_also_ask.title: Monkey Island (video game series) - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: The music has remained popular, and has been remixed by the musicians of OverClocked ReMix and by the game's fans. The Secret of Monkey Island ultimately cost $200,000 to produce, and was developed over nine months.
people_also_ask.title: The Secret of Monkey Island - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: 2) The Spencer family used to manage fishing in that stretch of the Thames in the 18th century. Local fishermen would come to the island and pay to fish. Even back then, money was colloquially known as 'monkey', hence 'Monkey Island', because if you were coming to the island, you were going to spend a lot of money.02-Mar-2005
